entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Saturday 1 April 2023
